description: The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking a contractor to perform forage and grain harvesting at one of its farms in Normandin, Quebec.  The successful contractor will be required to provide the equipment and labor necessary to complete the work.  The contract will be awarded based on a competitive bidding process.
full_summary:
### Invitation to Tender: Forage and Grain Harvesting
#### Request for Proposal No. 01B46-24-026
#### Solicitation Reference Number: cb-971-65556855 Amendment 1
#### Publication Date: 2024-05-21 | Tender Closing Date: 2024-06-07T14:00:00

**Project Overview**

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is seeking offers from qualified contractors for forage and grain harvesting services at its Normandin Research Farm in Quebec, Canada, for the 2024 season. The scope of work includes harvesting forage and grain crops, adhering to AAFC's standards and regulations.

**Important Deadlines**

* **Site Visit**: Friday, May 30, 2024, 9:30 AM (Eastern Daylight Time), Quebec Research and Development Center, Normandin Research Farm.
* **Tender Closing Date**: Friday, June 7, 2024, 2:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time).

**Submission Requirements**

All interested contractors must submit their tenders electronically through the CanadaBuys service provider. Addenda, when issued, will be available from the CanadaBuys service provider.

**Mandatory Site Visit**

While not obligatory, attending the site visit on May 30, 2024, is highly recommended. Participants will be requested to sign an attendance form. AAFC reserves the right to provide alternative arrangements for contractors unable to attend.

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**

Tenders will be evaluated based on the contractor's ability to meet AAFC's requirements and provide a comprehensive plan for the forage and grain harvesting services.

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries related to this tender process, please contact Rachael Johnston, AAFC Contract Officer, via email at [rachael.johnston@agr.gc.ca](mailto:rachael.johnston@agr.gc.ca).
